name: Responsivetester
tagline: Creates a view with changeable width. Useful for testing the responsiveness of widgets. Derived from FlowType.js and redistributed under the MIT license.
body:
### Responsive Tester

ResponsiveTester is a simple javascript component for testing the responsiveness of widgets. It creates a view with a changeable width. 

### Authors and Contributors

Marielle Lange (@widged) 

This works is derived from FlowType.js and redistributed under the same MIT license.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
